item.title: Sundang add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Sundang add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Sundang add a quote by Isabel Allende
item.description: "The library is inhabited by spirits that come out of the pages at night." -- Isabel Allende

item.title: Sundang add a quote by John F. Kennedy
item.description: "Whether they be young in spirit, or young in age, the members of the Democratic Party must never lose that youthful zest for new ideas and for a better world, which has made us great." -- John F. Kennedy

item.title: Sundang add a quote by George Washington
item.description: "Perseverance and spirit have done wonders in all ages." -- George Washington

item.title: Sundang add a quote by Frank Lloyd Wright
item.description: "Love is the virtue of the Heart, Sincerity is the virtue of the Mind, Decision is the virtue of the Will, Courage is the virtue of the Spirit." -- Frank Lloyd Wright

item.title: Sundang add a quote by Sioux Indian Prayer
item.description: "Great Spirit, help me never to judge another until I have walked in his moccasins. " -- Sioux Indian Prayer

item.title: Sundang add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Music is the language of the spirit. It opens the secret of life bringing peace, abolishing strife." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Sundang add a quote by J.S. Bach
item.description: "The final aim and reason of all music is nothing other than the glorification of God and the refreshment of the spirit." -- J.S. Bach

item.title: Sundang add a quote by Soekarno
item.description: "Apa yang sudah disepakati secara politik, jangan pernah diperdebatkan secara estetis." -- Soekarno

item.title: Sundang add a quote by Imam Al-Haddad
item.description: "Reflection is the lamp of the heart. If it departs, the heart will have no light." -- Imam Al-Haddad

item.title: Sundang add a quote by Imam Ali
